1349: Everyone! The engine is ahead of us!

な、何とか逃げ切れた……ふぅ、しばらくは安全そうだけど、また予想外のものに出くわさないとも限らないわね……。
어, 어떻게든 도망쳤어…… 후, 한동안은 안전해 보이지만, 또 예상치 못한 걸 만날지도 몰라…….
Phew, we finally got rid of them.... We're safe for now, I hope we don't encounter any other obstacles....
The gates are closed...finally got rid of them, phew...this is safe for now, hope there are no more accidents ......
Hey, I managed to get away with it. ...... Phew, it looks safe for a while, but it doesn't mean I won't run into something unexpected again. ......
We're here, this is the engine of Moonlight Therone.
我们到了，这就是月光王座的动力炉了。
着いたわ。ここが月光王座の動力炉よ。
Here we are. This is the Moonlight Throne's power reactor.
Here we are. This is the power furnace of the Moonlight Throne.
Here we are. This is the power reactor of the Moonlight Throne.
The electricity is still working…better than I expect, we are still lucky~
电力设备似乎还在运行…核心动力炉的保存情况比预想中的要好，看来我们还是挺幸运的~
電力設備はまだ動いてるようね……コア動力炉の保存状態も——うん、予想よりいいし、ラッキーね。
전력 설비는 아직 작동하는 것 같네…… 코어 동력로의 보존 상태도——응, 예상보다 좋아서, 다행이네.
Looks like all the electrical equipment is still working.... The reactor is better preserved than I expected. Lucky us.
The electrical equipment seems to be still running...the core power furnace is better preserved than expected, so it seems we are still quite lucky~
Looks like the power equipment is still working ...... and the preservation of the core power reactor is--yeah, better than expected, lucky me.
It's my first time to look at this big iron ball… so this is great, it's the Herrscher core!
这么近距离看到这个大铁球还是第一次…原来这个东西这么厉害，居然就是律者的核心么！
この距離で、この鉄の玉を見るのは初めてだ……これが律者コアなのか？
이 거리에서 이 철구를 보는 건 처음이야…… 이게 율자 코어인가?
It's my first time seeing this big iron ball from close up... So this massive reactor is actually the Herrscher Core?
It's the first time I've seen this big iron ball so close... So this thing is so powerful, it's actually the core of the Ruler!
I've never seen this ball of steel from this distance before. ...... Is this the ritzy core?

No, the iron structure outside of the engine is a conductor and limitator, the Herrscher core is preserved in the reactor in this frame, we need to open ths reactor, and destroy the Herrscher core inside.
不，动力炉周围的钢铁结构只起到导能和拘束作用，而律者核心则保存在这个框架中心的反应炉里，我们现在要做的就是打开反应炉，将里面的律者核心摧毁掉。
いいえ、動力炉の周りにある鋼鉄球は、エネルギー誘導と固定に使われるものよ。律者コアは、その中心にある反応炉の中に保存されてるわ。今、私たちがすべきことは、この反応炉を開けて中の律者コアを壊すこと。
아니, 동력로 주변에 있는 강철구는 에너지 유도와 고정에 사용되는 거야. 율자 코어는 그 중심에 있는 반응로 안에 보관되어 있지. 지금, 우리가 해야 할 일은 이 반응로를 열어 안의 율자 코어를 부수는 거야.

No. The steel spheres around the power reactor are used for energy induction and fixation. The Herrscher Core is stored in the center of it. All we have to do now is to open it up and destroy the core inside.

No, the steel structure around the power furnace only serves as an energy conductor and constraint, while the Ruler core is kept in the reactor at the center of this frame, all we have to do now is to open the reactor and destroy the Ruler core inside.

No. The steel spheres around the power reactor are used for energy induction and fixation. The Ruler Core is stored in the reactor at the center of it. All we have to do now is to open this reactor and destroy the Ruler Core inside.
Huh…sounds easy. By the way~what does the 「Sirin」mean on top of this?
嚯…听着还蛮简单的。对了~话说这个上面写的「Sirin」到底是什么意思？
ふん、簡単に言ってくれるな。ところで、この上に書いてある「Sirin」ってのはなんだ？
흥, 쉽게 말하네. 그런데, 이 위에 써있는 「Sirin」라는 건 뭐야?
It sounds pretty simple. By the way~ What exactly is the meaning of the "Sirin" written on it?
It sounds pretty simple. By the way~ What exactly is the meaning of "Sirin" written on this?
Hmmm, that's easy for you to say. By the way, what is this "Sirin" written above this?
This…it's said that Sirin is the name of Second Herrscher, also put here as the code name of the power unit.
这个啊…据说Sirin（西琳）是第二律者的名字，作为动力炉的代号所以标注了上去。
これね……Sirinは第二律者「シーリン」のことよ。この動力炉の名称として標記してるんでしょうね。
이거……Sirin은 제2 율자 「시린」를 말해. 이 동력로의 명칭으로 표기하고 있는 거겠죠.
That.... "Sirin" was the name of the Second Herrscher. Seems like they used it as the code name for this reactor.
This ah ... it is said that Sirin (Sirin) is the name of the second Ruler, as the code name of the power furnace so marked up.
Here it is: ......Sirin means "Sirin," the Second Ruler. I guess they are marking it as the name of this power reactor.
The name of Herrscher? Well it's very kind of you, what's the value of a dead person?
律者的名字？你还真是热心呢，这种死掉的人的名字有什么价值？
律者の名前？勉強熱心だなぁ、死んだ人の名前まで覚えてるなんて。
율자의 이름? 공부 열심히 하네, 죽은 사람 이름까지 기억하다니.
The name of a Herrscher? You're pretty studious if you can remember the name of a dead person.
The name of a Herrscher? You are really enthusiastic, what is the value of the name of such a dead person?
The names of the scribes? You are so studious, you even remember the names of dead people.

Well…let's get ready rather than discussing this, I will remove the protection system of the power unit, you stay here and watch out, don't get too close to it, the Herrscher core enegry is strong, we need to be careful.
好了好了…与其讨论这个还是准备一下吧，我去把动力炉的防护装置解除掉，你们在这里注意警戒，千万不要太过靠近动力炉，律者核心的能量很大，需要谨慎应对。
はいはい、そんなことより早速準備しましょう。動力炉の保護装置を解除してくるから、ここで待機してて。律者コアのエネルギーは膨大だから、動力炉にはあまり近づかないようにね。
알았어 알았어, 그런 것보다 어서 준비하자. 동력로의 보호 장치를 해제하러 갈 테니까, 여기서 대기하고 있어. 율자 코어의 에너지는 방대하니까, 동력로에는 너무 가까이 가지 말라고.

Sure... Alright, enough talk, we need to get this done sooner than later. I'm going to deactivate the reactor's protection system. The Honkai Energy stored within it is enormous, so don't get too close to it.

Okay, okay...instead of discussing this or get ready, I'm going to disarm the power furnace, you guys stay here on guard, never get too close to the power furnace, the Ruler core is very energetic and needs to be dealt with carefully.

Yes, yes, let's get ready as soon as possible. I'm going to deactivate the power reactor's protective device, so stay here. The energy in the law core is enormous, so don't get too close to the power reactor.
